mapper.select: select shoppingcart.shopcartId as shopcartid, shoppingcart.userId as userid, shoppingcart.goodsId as goodsid, shoppingcart.goodsNum as goodsnum, goods.goodsName as goodsname, goods.goodsState as goodsstate, goods.goodsPrice as goodsprice, goods.goodsBrand as goodsbrand, goods.goodsStock as goodsstock, goods.goodsInfo as goodsinfo, DATE_FORMAT(goods.goodsRegisterTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as goodsregistertime, goodsfunction.gfName as gfname, goodsserie.gsName as gsname, goodstype.gtypeName as gtypename from shoppingcart inner JOIN goods ON goods.goodsId=shoppingcart.goodsId inner JOIN goodsfunction ON goods.gfId=goodsfunction.gfId inner JOIN goodsserie ON goodsserie.gsId=goods.gsId inner JOIN goodstype ON goodstype.gtypeId=goods.gtypeId where shoppingcart.userId=#{userId}
